title: New client won't open, it keeps crashing
body: I have no idea why but im using legacy client until I know a fix

replies.body: Where does it crash and what error messages do you receive or behavior you observe when it does?

it crashes as soon as I press the login button and the message a ziggs saying oops something went wrong and send report or dont send
if you don't know what I mean I can post a screenshot.

Ah, so it's a Bugsplat. These are common when League experiences a poor interaction with your system drivers or hardware. We've consolidated a list of common solutions inside our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I'd recommend giving those steps a try.

Let me know the results!
